彌勒.definition: Maitreya, the future Bodhisattva, to come after Shakyamuni Buddha

彌勒佛.definition: Maitreya; the Bodhisattva that will be the next to come after Shakyamuni Buddha

彌合.definition: to cause a wound to close up and heal

彌天.definition: filling the entire sky; covering everything (of fog, crime, disaster etc)

彌封.definition: to sign across the seal (as a precaution against fraud)

彌散.definition: to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)

彌月.definition: full moon; first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)

彌渡.definition: Midu county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

彌渡縣.definition: Midu county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

彌漫.definition: to pervade; to fill the air; diffuse; everywhere present; about to inundate (water); permeated by (smoke); filled with (dust); to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)

彌留.definition: seriously ill and about to die

彌留之際.definition: on one's deathbed; at the point of death

彌縫.definition: to cover up mistakes or crimes; to stitch up; to fix

彌補.definition: to complement; to make up for a deficiency

彌陀.definition: Amitabha, the Buddha of the Western Paradise; abbr. for 阿彌陀佛|阿弥陀佛; Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
